title: Rightward AD curve shift causes increase in PL

content.question: Which of the following will cause an increase in the price level in the short run?

choices.label: A rightward shift in the aggregate demand curve
A rightward shift in the short-run aggregate supply curve
A rightward shift in the long-run aggregate supply curve

content.answer: A rightward shift in the aggregate demand curve

topic.text: 3.6: Changes in the AD-AS Model in the Short Run

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
